Ένα γρήγορο review χωρίς πολλά-πολλά.

Είναι ένα απίστευτο και έξυπνο παιχνίδι. Αν σας άρεσε το πρώτο, αυτό θα το λατρέψετε και τα δεδομένα ανατρέπονται.
Προσωπικά ευχαριστήθηκα κάθε λεπτό στο παιχνίδι. Είχε αρκετό χιούμορ και αρκετά περισσότερα επίπεδα να βγάλετε που κάποια θα σας δυσκολέψουν αρκετά. Το τέλος του μου φάνηκε αρκετά συγκινητικό κάτι που δεν περίμενα καθόλου.

Σας το πρωτινό ανεπιφύλακτα και φυσικά καλό θα ήταν να παίξετε το πρώτο Portal.
Супер игрушка советую всем!

portal 2 lets you bounce around and paint stuff. if i was still in kindergarden, i would probably have enjoyed this game a lot more. still, this is a very well made video game which breaks the laws of physics.

Good game, good co-op (Voice Co-op may help more), good plot twists, get this game


Good shit

Super gra. Mnóstwo zwrotów akcji, zabawnych dialogów i wciągająca fabuła, która przypomniała mi co tak naprawdę stanowi istotę dobrej gry i skłoniła do refleksji. Pomimo, że zasady są banalne - rób wszystko za pomocą dwóch portali, to nie raz przejście danego poziomu było dla mnie nie lada łamigłówką. Polecam tą grę, jak i jej poprzednią cześć każdemu, kto miałby ochotę w atmosferze swobody i dobrego humoru odprężyć się kilka ładnych godzin.

Uno de los mejores juegos que eh jugado en la vida, tiene una modalidad de juego muy buena, buenos controles, buenos graficos; La historia continua del juego de Portal, solo que esta vez además que el juego es mas largo agregaron el modo multijugador; ME fascina la comedia que maneja nunca puedo evitar reír por alguno de los comentarios de cualquiera de las maquinas, saben como meterte muy buien en el juego, hay muchas cosas que no te esperas

great game, lots of challenges, and very intresting story line. my only problem is the boring silence in some parts of the game (after the fall) and the fact that it constantly crashes. maybe once every like, 30 minutes.

A fantastic game from start to beginning. It is most definitely worth every dime. There is tons of replayability. The quality of the puzzles and style of them are like nothing I've ever encountered before (except Portal 1.) Although even Portal 1 didn't have the complexity and variations in puzzles. It also didn't have the same depth of story. Buy this game. It is worth it. Don't even play it, just buy it so that the people who made the piece of art get due credence. That is how good this game is.
Amazing game
This is an outstanding game. The graphics are gorgeous, the storyline is intriguing, interesting gameplay. Well worth the price, especially since I grabbed it while it was on sale!

이게임은 내인생최고의 게임에 남을정도로 대단한게임이다.
이게임은 FPS는 총만쏴대고 죽이는 게임이라는 고정관념을 깨버렸다
포탈건으로 포탈을 쏴대고 머리를 굴리며 탈출하는 게임
처음엔 좀 어렵지만 익숙해지다보면 재미가 붙는다.
스토리도 정말 좋다. 스포일러는 안하겠다. 정말 좋다 
이게임은 스팀러들의 필수게임이라고 생각한다.

Semplicemente geniale, nonchè il mio gioco preferito di sempre. Analizziamolo più profondamente.

PRO:
+Gameplay simile all'originale, ma con delle modifiche e aggiunte fantastiche. Non so che dire, ha un gameplay che è perfetto.
+Graficamente - pur essendo motore grafico Source - impressionante, motore fisico eccezionale dai tempi di Half-Life 2
+Ottimizzazione per pc INCREDIBILE, con quella grafica gira pure sui tostapani COMUNQUE a risoluzione massima e impostazioni grafiche al massimo a 60fps
+Trama fantastica, che inizia come se fosse nulla di che e progredisce in una storia intricata e coinvolgente
+Colonna sonora anche qua, perfetta. Un album pieno di bellissimi pezzi originali di musica elettronica che si addice alla perfezione al gioco

CONTRO:
Questo gioco, secondo la mia opinione, non ne ha. Forse una cosa che può dare fastidio a qualcuno, è la longevità, ma a me personalmente non ha dato fastidio, anzi, 11 ore è la giusta durata per un gioco del genere.

GAMEPLAY: 99/100
VIDEO: 91/100
AUDIO: 100/100
TRAMA: 97/100

Un gioco praticamente perfetto, non c'è che dire.

GLOBALE: 99/100

Un gioco meraviglioso che ti prende appena lo giochi per la prima volta! La cosa migliore è l'introduzione della cooperativa che vede come protagonisti i due robot Atlas e P-Body, molto divertente e travolgente se giocata con un amico. Ottimo lavoro Valve! 
Voto: 1000001/10

Ein Juwel! Ein wunderbares Beispiel dafür, dass auch Spiele ohne große Action einen Heidenspaß machen können. 
Kreative Spielidee, humorvoll und eine absolut zeitlose Grafik die auch 2014 immer noch einen zeitgemäßen Eindruck macht.
Eine absolute Empfehlung.
Игрой довольна. Всем советую. Всё очень круто, а главное можно играть в кооперативе
This game is awsome!!

Portal 2 ist ein tolles Puzzle-Adventure, dass es sich lohnt zu spielen! Nachdem der Roboter [i]Wheatley[/i] die Kontrolle über die bereits aus Portal 1 bekannten Labore von Aperture Science übernimmt, muss man sich im alten Trakt mit teilweise zerstörten Tests zurechtfinden und erfährt dabei viel über die Geschichte der Aperture Wissenschaft.
Ano je to super hra xD
Sehr sehr geiles Spiel.
Brilliant game and the sheer number of community maps available make it even better.
great puzzle game, great storyline and also features humor in the jokes told in the dialogue. fantastic.
muy buena la historia la jugabilidad,la verdad que me encanto.Estaria bueno que saque PORTAL 3

9/10

cons:

Genial

C'est rare quand un jeu arrive à m'accrocher autant que l'a fait Portal 2...

Ce jeu reprend le principe de Portal 1 en y rajoutant des mécaniques supplémentaires tout au long, ce qui évite de rendre le jeu répétitif. En plus de cela vient s'ajouter un monde et une histoire bien pensés, et surtout bien illustrés par le moteur graphique Source. Le moteur de Valve m'avait déjà plus dans TF2 et il montre ici toutes ces capacités (qui étaient sous-exploités sous TF2).
Malgrés sa durée de vie assez courte (une petite diziane d'heures), il vaut largement le détour. Pour vous donner une idée j'ai fait les trois derniers quarts du jeu en une journée tellement j'était immergé dans le jeu et son univers.
awesome!!1!

When I first bought this game I was a bit skeptical, but as soon as I played it I was amazed. Portal 2 is a great buy. The campaign is great, it uses a combination of humor, and seriousness to bring the Plot together. Using quick thinking, and problem solving you (as the main character) have to solve a series of complex puzzles, to complete each "test". If/ when the Campaign get's boring there is always the "Player Made" courses that you can play on. Not intrested in that? Well Portal 2 also has a fun Co-Op mode that is great to play with you and a friend. Something about solving a puzzle using team work has always been something that I have been intrested in, while I game. I highly recommend purchasing this game if you haven't already!
Einer der besten Denk- und Rätselspielen die ich je gezockt habe und ich freu mich schon auf Portal 3 :)
If you are on the fence about buying this game, buy it. it is one the best games out there
Игра хорошая и очень даже ничего.Но одному немного скучновато.Так как охото больше побегать и подурачиться,что в одиночку не очень получается.

I'd recommend this game to anyone I meet.
It's a very very good sequel to Portal 1, which is also known as 'Portal', the first version of the game.

You guys should definitely play this game, it has new functions, of course, and also new characters!, Well but thats obvious.
But mainly, this game has such good graphics, a good storyline, functions with your controllers, and it has a coop mode aswell.
And the only downside for me is, that it takes about 11.9 GB of RAM Space in your Laptops/PC or Mac, but meh.

In Portal 2, you can download custom maps STRAIGHT from the game itself, unlike Portal, where you have to move the .bsp file to the folder that contains it.

It also has custom coop maps that you can download, so you don't get bored to death playing the orginal ones over and over and over.

*SPOILER ALERT*
It also has a few easter eggs :DDDDD WHICH IS AWESOME!!!

*NO MORE SPOLERS :PPP*
Portal 2 is mainly about the history of Aperture Science, relating how the robot GLaDOS got all out of control.
So, if you are interested on what the history of Aperture Science might be, download this game.

And also if you want to have some 'fun' PLAY THIS GAME NOW NOW NOW NOW NOW!!!! GOGOGO :D

I like the part where you solve puzzles.


10/10

An great puzzle game, Portal 2 build on all the success of the original portal with even more witty humor from the interactions between weartly and GLADOS just made me laugh. 

The new CO-OP gamemode adds a new elements of game play allowing you to do whole new puzzles with a buddy with a whole new side story. 

Well worth getting you won't regret it
ce jeu dechir
Great game, Valve did their best!
iz gewd
The Multiplayer on this is sweet. I totally recommend playin this witha  friend.
Really really fun. Single player is very fun but the co-op is even more fun. Played this through on PS3 and on my PC and loved it every time.

I bought this for the PS3 and then I bought it for this. That just shows you my love for this game right there. I don't really have to tell you how much I love this game, it's allready been reviewed to death and back. We all know the Cave Johnson lemon monologue, we all know the thing with the potato and we all know that Stephen Merchant needs to do more voice acting. Another piece of bliss from Valve.
I love portals great game love the playthrough and story line.

I shouldn't have waited this long to play this.  Awesome as expected.   Not sure the puzzles or gameplay has changed much from the first one (one of my all time favorites) but the commentary makes this great in its own right.
P0rtal 2! Genial
Who wants to make 60 dollars?!?

Its exactly like Portal, except Portal 2 is much longer. It's still whacky and zany. Frankly, Aperture sceince is a really hilarious company, and we get to see more of it. And of course, there is Glados, the lovable yet snide and sarcastic villian. 

The puzzles are even better now, though. And there are a lot more of them, too. In fact, 9 chapters worth. The history of Aperture science and its experiements is explored thoroughly as well. There is a real narrative with compelling characters that spice things up. It's a stupid amount of fun. And with the added feature of being able to create, upload, and play custom maps, there is limiteless gameplay and possibilities. 

Go buy it.
sehr gut
Otro buen juego de Valve con una historia entretenida, y el modo cooperativo es de por si, genialísimo!
This is hands down the best game I have ever played.
Una maravilla de juego, el 1 me dejo un poco con las ganas de más, pero con el 2... 10/10 no solo por la historia sino por su pedazo de modo cooperativo! Muchisimas horas de diversión aseguradas!

Es un juegazo, para mi uno de los mejores de el año en el que lo sacaron, ha superado a Portal, el cual ya fue un juego muy bueno, y Portal 2 tiene una trama que nadie se imaginaría.

Al final del videojuego se muestra, a mi parecer, el lado "cariñoso" y "amable" de GLaDOS:
[spoiler]Al final del juego, cuando te vas de Aperture Science, suena una canción, llamada [url=https://play.spotify.com/track/0pUj6YW68tuLz4PDkyatik]"Cara Mia Addio"[/url], lo que en italiano significa "adiós mi querida".[/spoiler]

La música y los gráficos del juego, en mi opinón, son fantásticos.

Me he pasado tanto el "single player" como el "multi player" los dos me han encantado, los dos tienen sus puntos cómicos y también sus momentos inesperados. Te hace pensar, y, a veces, desesperarte si no encuentras la solución de los puzles

Se  lo recomiendo a todo aquél que lea esto, ni te lo pienses, pon dinero en tu cuenta y compralo, no vas a malgastarlo.

Últimamente porque no tengo tiempo, sino, este sería mi juego mas jugado.
Amazing.
Hammer gut!! Die Rätsel werden zwar ganz schön knackig aber der Humor dahinter ist klasse! Und läuft ziemlich gut glaube verwendet die HalfLife2 Engine

I have to agree with the majority in that this game is super fun fantastic and is much better than its predecessor. The storyline is beutiful in its comedy and the creation of a backdrop to the first game as well as this one. The gameplay is still smooth like the first game. And the graphics/asthetics are so cool as it evolves throughout the game from the sterile, clean, and bright test areas to the edgy dark tones of other parts of the game. This game is a must-play for those who love puzzle games or games full of rich story and environment. I would give this game a 10 out of 10!
